function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through contact with shared biomarker measurement devices (e.g., thermal cameras, sensors)","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases transmission within built environments","Mitigation":"Regular sanitation and disinfection of biomarker measurement devices, use of disposable covers or protective barriers, and implementation of touchless technology for measurement","Technologies":"Touchless sensors, antimicrobial surfaces, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) for disinfection","People":"Occupants, building users, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Risk of increased infection through contact with commonly touched surfaces during occupant health assessments (e.g., survey instruments)","Impact":"Higher probability of disease transmission due to surface contact","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of survey instruments, use of touchless or voice-activated survey tools, and implementation of digital survey platforms","Technologies":"Voice-activated survey tools, digital survey platforms, antimicrobial coatings for surfaces","People":"Survey administrators, building occupants","Owner":"Building researchers, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of discussion and consideration of contagious disease transmission risk in the literature on occupant health assessment tools","Impact":"Potential oversight of important health risk factors in built environments","Mitigation":"Integration of contagious disease transmission risk assessments into the design and evaluation of occupant health assessment tools, and publication of guidelines for safe usage of measurement devices and survey instruments","Technologies":"Data analytics for risk assessment, publication of industry guidelines for safe usage of tools","People":"Researchers, building practitioners, health and safety professionals","Owner":"Building researchers, health and safety professionals"}]}
